data.lyric:
[ti:Rewrite the Stars (《马戏之王》电影插曲)]
[ar:Zac Efron/Zendaya]
[al:The Greatest Showman (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Rewrite The Stars - Zac Efron (扎克·埃夫隆)/Zendaya (赞达亚)
[00:00.26]Written by：Justin Paul/Benj Paskek
[00:00.52]Zac Efron：
[00:00.78]You know I want you
[00:02.10]
[00:04.69]It's not a secret I try to hide
[00:07.27]
[00:08.52]I know you want me
[00:09.91]
[00:12.23]So don't keep saying our hands are tied
[00:15.05]
[00:16.21]You claim it's not in the cards
[00:18.01]But fate is pulling you miles away
[00:21.20]And out of reach from me
[00:23.57]
[00:24.12]But you're here in my heart
[00:25.75]So who can stop me if I decide
[00:28.78]That you're my destiny
[00:32.51]
[00:34.35]What if we rewrite the stars
[00:37.43]
[00:37.96]Say you were made to be mine
[00:41.11]
[00:41.90]Nothing could keep us apart
[00:44.98]
[00:45.73]You'd be the one I was meant to find
[00:48.71]
[00:49.58]It's up to you and it's up to me
[00:52.44]
[00:53.17]No one can say what we get to be
[00:57.05]So why don't we rewrite the stars
[01:00.42]
[01:01.21]Maybe the world could be ours
[01:04.69]
[01:05.39]Tonight
[01:05.79]
[01:12.63]Zendaya：
[01:13.03]
[01:13.79]You think it's easy
[01:15.00]
[01:17.57]You think I don't want to run to you
[01:20.47]
[01:21.43]But there are mountains
[01:22.91]
[01:25.25]And there are doors that we can't walk through
[01:28.13]
[01:28.99]I know you're wondering why
[01:31.17]Because we're able to be
[01:32.93]Just you and me
[01:35.10]Within these walls
[01:37.02]But when we go outside
[01:38.85]You're going to wake up and see that it was hopeless after all
[01:45.60]
[01:46.91]No one can rewrite the stars
[01:50.81]How can you say you'll be mine
[01:54.17]
[01:54.74]Everything keeps us apart
[01:58.54]And I'm not the one you were meant to find
[02:02.40]It's not up to you
[02:04.10]It's not up to me
[02:05.99]When everyone tells us what we can be
[02:09.84]How can we rewrite the stars
[02:13.86]Say that the world can be ours
[02:17.64]
[02:18.15]Tonight
[02:18.69]Both：
[02:19.06]All I want is to fly with you
[02:23.00]All I want is to fall with you
[02:26.46]
[02:27.17]So just give me all of you
[02:31.18]Zendaya：
[02:31.46]It feels impossible
[02:32.31]Zac Efron：
[02:32.74]It's not impossible
[02:33.39]Zendaya：
[02:33.65]Is it impossible
[02:34.89]Both：
[02:35.16]Say that it's possible
[02:38.47]
[02:39.02]How do we rewrite the stars
[02:42.70]Say you were made to be mine
[02:46.02]
[02:46.67]Nothing can keep us apart
[02:50.26]Cause you are the one I was meant to find
[02:53.59]
[02:54.32]It's up to you
[02:55.36]
[02:55.95]And it's up to me
[02:57.43]
[02:57.93]No one can say what we get to be
[03:01.74]And why don't we rewrite the stars
[03:05.71]Changing the world to be ours
[03:10.18]
[03:10.69]Zendaya：
[03:11.27]
[03:18.36]You know I want you
[03:20.21]
[03:22.29]It's not a secret I try to hide
[03:25.10]
[03:26.10]But I can't have you
[03:28.05]
[03:30.15]We're bound to break and my hands are tied
